name: places/ChIJueKQnF5YwokR73svBEw3JKw
formattedAddress: 238 W 61st St, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 238 W 61st St, New York, NY 10023-7803, USA

originalText.text:
This is a very professional and systematic clinic, and they truly care about the wellbeing of your pets.
Our 13 year old poodle Muffin recently had a dental procedure done by Dr Kahn, and we couldn’t be happier! Dr Kahn explained thoroughly about how it would be done prior to the procedure, and she kept updating us the progress during the surgery. It was a very intensive procedure, and we were really worried given Muffin’s age, but with all the love and care she received at the clinic, she’s now so much livelier as if she’s 8 again!
We would like to thank Dr Kahn, vet nurses, and all the front desk staff from the bottom of our hearts!

originalText.text: 4 months ago, we brought our dog to be put down. It was our first time at Hudson, and the whole staff was amazing to us. I will never forget how attentive and caring both the doctor and assistant, Flo were. They even lit a candle for our boy. Thank you everyone for making his last moments memorable. I know Diddy enjoyed the many treats and peanut butter he got.

originalText.text: I brought my two cats here. We originally tried a vet closer to our apartment but they didn't keep digital records amongst other concerns. Hudson Animal Hospital is amazing. They are professional, thorough, patient, and very helpful. Getting an appointment took a couple weeks since they're probably backed up, but well worth it. The clinic itself is very clean and tidy. I'm so glad we switched!

text.text: I brought my two cats here. We originally tried a vet closer to our apartment but they didn't keep digital records amongst other concerns. Hudson Animal Hospital is amazing. They are professional, thorough, patient, and very helpful. Getting an appointment took a couple weeks since they're probably backed up, but well worth it. The clinic itself is very clean and tidy. I'm so glad we switched!

originalText.text: We love Hudson Animal Hospital!! After trying out some popular “name brand” veterinary practices near our apartment, we felt as though we were not receiving good quality care. After visiting this clinic, we are so glad we made the switch! The vet techs are very polite and great with my pup, they even remembered that she gets nervous at the vet and will play with her/cuddle her to ease the anxiety. We see Dr. Kahn who is very skilled and knowledgeable in her practice. She is real with us, assuring, and treats our pup with great care. The front desk staff are amazing too as they always are very responsive either over email or phone. This hospital treats every pet with individualistic care as a top priority. I know this because I have witnessed them open early during their lunch break to give emergency care to a dog in need. I can’t recommend this facility enough and feel so at peace knowing my pup is receiving great care!!

originalText.text:
I had a great experience with Dr. Yoshida, she was very knowledgeable and thorough in examining my cat. She took her time examining him, asking and answering questions, and was very kind and patient.

The staff was very nice and helpful as well! They are so responsive over email. The doctor even followed up with me a few days later to see how my cat is doing which I really appreciated.
